TEXT.TITLE: BANKERS TRUST CO RAISES BROKER LOAN RATE
TEXT.BODY: Bankers Trust Co said it raised its broker loan rate to 7-1/4 pct from seven pct, effective immediately. U.S. Trust Co, which also quotes its broker loan rate publicly, is posting a 7-1/2 pct rate. Reuter
